Installation of a double coaxial TV cable distribution system in conduit
would permit all rooms so connected to have closed-circuit TV receiver outlets
ard, at the same time, permit TV camera pick-up from any room on the circuit.
Thus, in any room on the campus so wired, a class could observe a teacher or
class in any of the spots wired into the coaxial system.
